mapper.select: SELECT t.`id` AS id, t.`name` AS name, t.`city` AS city, t.`college` AS college, t.`school` AS school, t.`clazz` AS clazz, t.`major` AS major, t.`introduce` AS introduce, t.`createuser` AS createuser, t.`createtime` AS createtime, t.`updateuser` AS updateuser, t.`updatetime` AS updatetime, t.`deadtime` AS deadtime, t.`type` AS type, t.`leader` AS leader, t.`team_count` AS teamCount FROM team AS t ,and_team_user AS aut WHERE aut.team_id = t.id AND aut.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT count(1) FROM and_team_user WHERE team_id = #{id}

SELECT `id` AS id, `name` AS name, `city` AS city, `college` AS college, `school` AS school, `clazz` AS clazz, `major` AS major, `introduce` AS introduce, `createuser` AS createuser, `createtime` AS createtime, `updateuser` AS updateuser, `updatetime` AS updatetime, `deadtime` AS deadtime, `type` AS type, `leader` AS leader, `team_count` AS teamCount FROM team
AND name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
order by createtime desc
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT `id` AS id, `name` AS name, `city` AS city, `college` AS college, `school` AS school, `clazz` AS clazz, `major` AS major, `introduce` AS introduce, `createuser` AS createuser, `createtime` AS createtime, `updateuser` AS updateuser, `updatetime` AS updatetime, `deadtime` AS deadtime, `type` AS type, `leader` AS leader, `team_count` AS teamCount FROM team WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT atu.user_id AS id, u.username AS userName,atu.role_id AS roleId ,r.name AS roleName FROM and_team_user AS atu LEFT join `user` AS u ON atu.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN `role` as r ON atu.role_id = r.id WHERE atu.team_id = #{teamId}
select count(1) FROM team WHERE team_id = #{teamId} and user_id = #{userId};
